# Test Generator Application

This is a desktop application for creating and managing test questions with the following features:

## Core Features
- Store up to 250 questions with answers and categories
- Generate printable tests of 25 random questions
- Configure category distribution (percentage per category)
- Question management (view, edit, delete)
- Test taker name input
- Printable output

## Technical Requirements
- Desktop GUI application
- Question database storage
- Category management system
- Random question selection with category constraints
- Print-friendly test generation

## Project Structure
- Question management interface
- Test generation interface
- Configuration/settings tab
- Database/storage layer
